ContactPage.available247: We are available 24/7, 7 days a week.
ContactPage.fillForm: Fill out our form and we will contact you within 24 hours.

AboutPage.storyParagraph1: Launched in 2015, Exclusive is South Asia's premier online shopping marketplace with an active presence in Bangladesh. Supported by wide range of tailored marketing, data and service solutions, Exclusive has 10,500 sellers and 300 brands and serves 3 millions customers across the region.
AboutPage.storyParagraph2: Exclusive has more than 1 Million products to offer, growing at a very fast. Exclusive offers a diverse assortment in categories ranging from consumer.
AboutPage.shoppingWomenAlt: Two women shopping with colorful shopping bags
AboutPage.annualGrossSale: Annual gross sale in our site
AboutPage.freeDeliveryDesc: Free delivery for all orders over $140
